summary.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the objects returned from WMI should contain amended information.

summary.span: Typically, amended information is localizable information attached to the WMI object, such as object and property descriptions.

span.span: Returns a value indicating whether the objects returned from WMI should contain amended information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## Valore proprietàProperty Value `true` Se gli oggetti restituiti da WMI devono contenere informazioni corrette; in caso contrario, `false`.`true` if the objects returned from WMI should contain amended information; otherwise, `false`.
